title: As it happened: Amtrak train plunges on to US highway - BBC News
summary: at least six people were killed and dozens more injured , reports say .
the train , on a new section of track , fell on to the i-5 highway near dupont in washington state .
several cars on the highway were struck .
more than 80 people were on board the train .
the accident happened at 07:30 local time ( 15:30 gmt ) some 45 minutes into the journey between seattle and portland .

documents.title: quick recap as live page is closing down
text: we 're now closing our live page following the derailment of the passenger train on its inaugural run in washington state .
a recovery operation is continuing , and officials are so far declining to provide any casualty numbers .
here 's a quick recap of what we know and also latest reports in the us media :
you can still follow all the latest updates on this story and other news on the bbc news website .

documents.title: 'emergency ! we are on the ground ! ' - audio recording
text: audio recordings from the aftermath of the crash , apparently of the train 's conductor and railway dispatchers , have now emerged .
the conductor is heard saying : `` emergency !
emergency !
emergency !
we are on the ground ! ''
komonews.com reports .
he then calls for emergency medical services to arrive as soon as possible .
broadcastify.com provided the audio recordings via abc news .

documents.title: 'priority is recovery ' - latest official briefing
text: at the latest media briefing , us officials said that seventy-seven passengers and seven crew members were on board the train .
amtrak earlier spoke of approximately 78 travellers and five crew .
the officials declined to provide any details on the casualty numbers , saying only that the `` priority right now is recovery '' .

documents.title: 'we are deeply saddened ' - amtrak chief executive
text: from amtrak president and co-ceo richard anderson regarding train 501 : on behalf of everyone at amtrak , we are deeply saddened by all that has happened today .
we will do everything in our power to support our passengers and crew and their families . ''
condolences to the families of the victims , and prayers for the injured .

what difference would a seatbelt have made in this circumstance ?
please do provide some logical backing for that idea
it would prevent people from flying out of their seats and likely could reduce fatalities and injuries .

seatbelts would have done nothing to stop them getting hurt

documents.title: 'i just wanted to help people because i would want people to help me '
text: daniel konzelman , 24 , was driving parallel to the train on his way to work .
he was about 30 seconds ahead of the train on the mortorway when he saw it derail .
he stopped , and with his friend , went to help trapped passengers .
two friends driving parallel to the tracks where an amtrak train derailed in seattle stayed nearly two hours helping the injured .

documents.title: what we know
text: a train has derailed on its inaugural run in the north-western united states .
carriages left the track as it crossed a bridge , crashing on to the motorway below at the height of the morning rush hour .
unconfirmed reports speak of at least six deaths while medical officers say 77 people have been taken to hospital .
the train may have struck something on the track before derailing , according to one report .
it was the first train to run along a new , faster route from seattle in washington state to portland , oregon .

documents.title: train 'may have hit something ' before derailing - ap
text: an official briefed on the investigation told the associated press that preliminary signs indicate that train 501 may have struck something before going off the track .
early signs indicate an amtrak train taking its first trip on a new faster route in washington state may have hit something before derailing and killing passengers , an official told @ twitterid

documents.title: 'train crumpled ' - passenger 's account

`` at a certain point the train started to wobble a little bit and the next thing that we knew we were down in a ditch .
the train had crumpled , '' he said .

documents.title: blood donations plea
text: the city of lacey - which is located in nearby thurston county - is calling for blood donations to be made at local hospitals to help treat victims .

documents.title: 22 victims in nearby hospitals
text: multicare health , a local not-for-profit network of hospitals , says that 22 victims are now in its hospitals .
victims from the amtrak train that derailed in dupont are at 3 of our hospitals : 14 patients at @ twitterid 5 at @ twitterid 3 at @ twitterid thank you to the first responders on the scene .
our thoughts are w/the passengers , their families and their friends .
resources : family reunification center : dupont city hall , 1700 civic drive , dupont , 98327 amtrak number for families and friends : 800-523-9101
all multicare hospitals are open and fully operational .
our hospitals are accepting patients in the emergency room , admitting prescheduled patients and performing previously scheduled procedures as planned .
thank you for your help !

documents.title: what does a 'state of emergency ' mean ?
text: according to a document published by the governor 's office , in a state emergency , `` state agencies and departments are directed to utilize state resources and to do everything reasonably possible to assist in an effort to respond to and recover from the incidents '' .

documents.title: height of rush-hour
text: it was the height of the rush-hour on the busy i-5 motoway and the train was reportedly travelling at more than 80 miles per hour .
the local sheriff says it came off the rails near the city of tacoma at 07:40 in the morning ( 15:40 gmt ) , smashing on to cars and at least one lorry on the road below .
passengers spoke of a rocking and creaking noise as the train rounded a bend , followed by crashing and screaming .
to escape , one survivor said , they had to smash windows as the doors could not be opened .
train 501 was being operated by amtrak , the major us rail passenger company .
it was travelling from seattle in washington state to portland in oregon , and amtrak said there were approximately 78 passengers and five crew members on board .
state governor jay inslee thanked emergency services for their swift response and urged americans to pray for everyone on board .
author: James Cook
BBC's North America Correspondent

documents.title: washington governor : 'praying for the many injured '
text: washington governor jay inslee has described the incident as a `` serious and ongoing emergency '' and offered his prayers for those affected .
today 's tragic incident in pierce county is a serious and ongoing emergency .
trudi and i are holding in our hearts everyone on board , and are praying for the many injured .
they are our top priority , and i know first responders are doing everything to ensure everyone has the care they need .
everyone should avoid traveling i-5 , and wsdot is working to open alternative routes through the area during the emergency response .
this morning i spoke with my cabinet officials , and we are in touch with amtrak who we know are working to provide as much information as possible .
@ twitterid will have further updates , those in the area can mark themselves safe with facebook safety check , and i will be monitoring the situation with our team during the ongoing response .

documents.title: '78 passengers and five crew '
text: latest from amtrak : `` there were approximately 78 passengers and five crew members on board .
initial reports are that some injuries are reported to passengers and crew , and taken to local medical facilities for treatment . ''

documents.title: new service
text: the crash occurred at around 07:30 ( 15:30 gmt ) , as the train was travelling between portland and seattle .
the accident , which happened outside seattle , involved an amtrak train 501 - a new service running from seattle to portland .

documents.title: what we know
text: a passenger train has derailed from a bridge on to the motorway below in washington state , and police have confirmed that a number of people have been killed or injured .
we 'll bring you the latest , including reaction and correspondents ' reports .
